extendedInfo.description: This is the free version of Mystic Halo Live Wallpaper! Paid version adds touch events, multiple fade schemes, rotation schemes and special effects!Now works with Galaxy Nexus and Rezound! See "HD Phone" in settings to enable.Summary: ===============A cool, honeycomb-inspired abstract live wallpaper. Blue, patterned rings slowly rotate independently and fade in and out. OpengGL. Works on Honeycomb! Watch the video for a demo! Extremely low battery and resource usage (check battery stats)I created this wallpaper because I loved the basic art used and wished it would move. I'm also a bit tired of so many live wallpapers that look very cool, but are too "busy" or colorful to make good long-term useable wallpapers. This is pretty, but still a "background". Art is courtesy Ryan Bliss of Digital Blasphemy: http://www.digitalblasphemy.comPlease support poor dev and his dog by purchasing paid app. See "settings" for more info. Or at least give us a good rating! Paid app has these benefits:***************************** touch-enabled! Swipe up or down to spin the rings faster. Tap quickly to slow down again************* More options for colors! Tron blue, magenta, green, pink, MagBlue, red, "fire", "ice" and more coming soon!* multiple fade schemes: linear, heartbeat, pulse and none*configurable max/min fade, fade speed, and spin speed (in sync  and alt modes)* sync schemes: make the rings spin in sync, alternating pattern, or random pattern,* special effects: "centre glows" or does not fade out* change minimum fade value for linear fade style* shift circle centre up down or left and right!* scale circlesHas been tested on a variety of platforms. Works very well on WVGA phones (especially Galaxy S and Galaxy S 2). Scales correctly for Honeycomb (tested on Galaxy Tab 10.1).Performance heavily optimised using OpenGL and good memory handling. Won't slow your phone down at all. Any OS/platform not working, please email me. If you have a qHD phone, I would like to know if it's centered.Special thanks to "Deep" Live wallpaper dev and Robert Green for excellent OpenGL framework. I will open source this in time to contribute back.Please support me with a good rating! I will respond to all direct emails.**Known Issue: If you manually modify your DPI from what it should be then you will see white squaresThanks!

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: No special permissions to run, looks cool, few options, doesn\'t kill battery... Worth downloading, definitely.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful live wallpaper
reviews.comment: The best one I found so far, simple and elegant design if you like the futuristic look.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: One of the better live wallpapers in my opinion. It looks fantastic without overwhelming the screen as many live wallpapers seem to do. Definitely recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gorgeous
reviews.comment: One of the best LWPs available for free. Simple effect but very hypnotic. Would love to see more from this developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: kool wallpaper
reviews.comment: absolutely perfect love the color! runs smoothly n does not slow down my mobile! 5 stars!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great live wallpaper!
reviews.comment: Not obtrusive. Easy to see icons when using the wallpaper. Definitely a live wallpaper to have in your phone.
reviews.author: Steve Norton

reviews.comment: Runs smoother than htc live wallpapers! It doesnt slow down my phone at all. I\'m thinking about getting the paid app too for more colors. Good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super cool!
reviews.comment: This is si cool! I\'ll buy the full version soon cause I want the colors to match my phone cover... red.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Great wallpaper, matched with GO launcher Future World theme. Can turn fading off in wallpaper settings and also adjust rotating speed. Good stuff!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great!!!!
reviews.comment: excellent!! power saving,ram saving and cool background
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung g2 ICS
reviews.comment: Amazing! And beautiful.  :-) works perfectly well, never slows my phone down. I would go for the paid version, just I love the default colours. So maybe I will do it just to donate - it truly deserves that!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing app
reviews.comment: This is one of my favourite live wallpapers, ive had it for months and set everything on my galaxy s2 to blue to match the wallpaper but a few days ago it disappeared from my phone and i just checked the google play and it said it was still installed so i got rid of it and reinstalled it, should be fine now.
reviews.author: Brandon Byrnes

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Looks amazing, doesn\'t kill battery life, doesn\'t slow down my Vibrant. My favorite live wallpaper.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beautiful wallpaper
reviews.comment: This is one if the most beautiful live wallpapers in the market. I have galaxy note and I was worried that most wallpapers wouldn\'t have the support for note\'s resolution.  But for this one, there is an option in the settings to  choose \'HD\' for high resolution devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It looks epic!
reviews.comment: I love this live wallpaper I\'ve used so many different ones and out of all of them this one is for me it just look so dam good!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks nice..
reviews.comment: For some reason it isn\'t positioned center straight on my phone when I hit the \"HD phone\" feature! Its like half way down :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Looks perfect on droid bionic...is centered over the lower two-thirds of my screen when vertical, but it works out okay with my 4x1 clock across the top where I normally keep it.  Great work; will definitely support when able.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolute Class On Galaxy Note
reviews.comment: Love this live wallpaper - bigger the screen the better it looks. Hi-Tec looking and really cool.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: Simple is best....it is just classy enough. No battery drain change galaxy s 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: A lot of live wallpapers slow down your phone, but for some reason with this one, everything works perfectly, and It\'s really cool! :D
reviews.author: A Google User
